title: Gunman gets instant karma when the bird he shoots out of the sky nosedives into his GENITALS
text:
This bird got the best revenge as it took its last breath.

A hilarious video shared on social media shows a hunter shooting down a bird and getting into an unfortunate accident.

In the brief clip, the gunman can be seen shooting the bird.

Scroll down for video

A hilarious video shared on social media shows a hunter shooting down a bird and getting into an unfortunate accident

He connects with the flying animal, which can be seen continuously falling in the same direction it was flying.

But instead of simply falling to the ground, the bird crashes into the man's genitals.

The man can be heard groaning in pain as he grabs his region and rolls all over the deck he shot from.

The man can be heard groaning in pain as he grabs his region and rolls all over the deck he shot from

People in the background can be heard cackling as the gunman sits in his pain and embarrassment.

The bird can be seen lying motionlessly under a chair nearby.

It is unknown where the video was filmed but it does appear to be in the United States.
description: A hilarious video shared on social media shows a hunter shooting down a bird and getting into an unfortunate accident. It is unknown where the video was filmed but it does appear to be in America.
